title: Queue Schedule - Updated Nov 18, 2019
body:
Updated queue schedule below.

**On all the time:**
Summoner's Rift 5v5 Normal Blind
ARAM
Summoner's Rift Co-op vs AI (intro/beginner/intermediate)
Summoner's Rift Ranked Solo/Duo

**Summoner's Rift Ranked Flex:**

Disabled between: 5:00am - 8:00am AEST

**Summoner's Rift Normal Draft:**

Every Day: 11:00am-3:00am AEST

replies.body:
Hi folks

We've just updated the Twisted Treeline Ranked Flex schedule to include 2 extra days.   This will allow you to grind a bit extra for end of season rewards in all queues!

**Thursday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT
Friday: 3:00pm - 1:00am AEDT**

These extra days will be available until the end of season on Nov 12th.

Any questions, let me know!

Cheers
Mindstar
Any chance you could open it at 12/1pm AEDT for the sake of those of us in New Zealand?

What the fuck is up with rank im always stuck with  fuxking trolls and feeders and they cant work on fixing this like wtf i played 600 games now and still stuck in silver i get promoted to s1 then demoted to s3 every fucking time is really fucking annoying

You have a 50%~ winrate, and it looks like you've plateaued. Basically, you are what rank you should be for your skill, and if you want to climb higher you'll have to focus on improving not just playing your best.

Scores in Silver and below tend to be quite polarising, with games being heavy one way or the other (i.e they snowball more) which results in harsher losses (but also better wins), and at the end of the season stakes and tensions are higher exacerbating this effect.

The best thing you can do is keep your cool, getting frustrated at things you can't control will only make you play worse, especially if that translates to typing all game. Better to focus on what you *can* control, which is your own gameplay.

Also if you want to have a player behaviour discussion, better to have it in the Player Behaviour sub-board, and not on a random announcement thread, further comments of this nature will be removed.

Ive played 8 hours in a row and i havent even gotten anywhere causw of bloody trolls and afks and what pisses me off is there always in my fucking games its so annoying how do you guys get rid of these kunts getting really sick of this game

Playing any game for 8 hours isn't exactly recommended, especially if it is causing frustration and you aren't enjoying yourself. It may be ranked, but it is still a *game*, and if you aren't having fun, or at least competitive satisfaction, it's definitely time to take a break. 

My general policy is no more than three games in a row before taking at least a half hour, and if I lose (or sometimes just if it's a frustrating loss) I take at least a 10 minute break. Trust me your sanity and *your skill* will thank you. You'll play better when you're calm and focused that tilted off the face of the earth coming out of a bad loss. 

Then there's all the typical advice like remember to drink water, don't play games on a starving stomach, eat decent food, get sunshine and at least a little exercise etc etc.

Trolls happen, it sucks, though sometimes what we view as trolling is just a misplay or bad decision. You can't control trolls though, and if you get frustrated and start losing games, especially games after theirs because of it, then that's a big fat victory for them. Focus on what you can control, and if it's a loss, report them, take a break, and don't let them affect you beyond that.
Also can you make it so you can look at the skins you own on the website or mobile app please? {{summoner:39}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:32}}

Maybe it's an ad, but take a look! Im doing daily Katarina content (plus other champs!) Customs skins and montages/gameplay! You should take a look if you love daily League content. Maybe you'll love it! :yum:  https://www.youtube.com/c/MihuKat
my client once again froze loading in on my p1 promos and crashed so they remade and i lost promos fix you client thanks

To be fair though the current client runs like complete garbage and you can't access your loot tab half the time without relogging, and there have been so many times where it won't let me lock for whatever reason, I don't blame them lol

More like fix  your whole game and stop putting me with fricking trolls all the time 

Thanks
